title: PMXR - The Way
overview: PMXR /we(:)gr/ are runes (elder futhark) meaning ways or paths. In this film, Runi Langum opened her archive of sketches, drawings, lithography, animations and texts dating back several decades. Lena Heggelund used this material without any limitations to develop a distinctive animation. «THE Way» is composed freely and independent of chronology and type of materials used. This film was produced in june 2018.  The movie contains 84 original drawings, 84 sketches, and excerpts from 3 short animation films made by Runi Langum.
